Menu

Gray House

Authentic Mediterranean Cuisine

Appetizers

Beef Carpaccio • € 15

Beef carpaccio and homemade pastries stuffed with creamy cottage cheese

Cold Seafood Platter • € 18

Fresh shrimp, scallops, oysters, and calamari served with three sauces

Porcini Shrimp Risotto • € 12

Shrimp and porcini mushroom risotto with a creamy three-cheese sauce

Spinach and Cheese Burek • € 6 per slice

Crispy, flaky burek filled with layers of spinach and feta cheese; baked daily

Charcuterie Board • € 10

Seasonal variety of fruits and vegetables with house-made crackers and six varieties of rich cheeses and dips

Tzatziki Bruschetta • € 8

Tzatziki (cucumbers, yogurt, fresh herbs and olive oil) on warm ciabatta bread and topped with diced tomatoes, cucumber and onions

Zucchini Fritters • € 10

Fried, crispy zucchini with parmesan, herbs, and spices served with a side of house-made Greek fava

Entrees

Roasted Branzino • € 23

Slow-roasted stuffed sea bass with sautéed zucchini and mushrooms served with lemon caper butter

Monkfish Medallions • € 24

Monkfish medallions in a black truffle sauce with homemade gnocchi

Sea Bass Roll • € 24

Sea bass roll stuffed with a shrimp cream in a mussel busara sauce

Adriatic Fish • € 22

White Adriatic fish grilled or sautéed with olive oil, lemon saffron rice, and seasonal vegetables

Seafood Selection • € 26

Lobster cakes, scallops, oysters, and fried calamari with caper butter and parmesan green beans

Lamb Shank • € 28

Lamb shank in a forest mushroom sauce with pecorino ravioli and artichokes

Tuna Carbonara • € 22

Carbonara pasta with fresh tuna and tomatoes in a three-cheese sauce

Apple Pork Loin • € 26

Black pig pork loin medallions served with an apple puree and sautéed cabbage

Artichoke Chicken Breast • € 22

Roasted chicken breast and artichokes in creamy artichoke olive sauce

Goat Cheese Cappellacci • € 28

Homemade cappellacci stuffed with goat cheese and barena honey, baked tomato coulis, and parmesan foam
